title: Hazer-hatticon
html: HAZER-HATTICON(Haʹzer-hatʹti·con).A site mentioned in Ezekiel’s vision as on the boundary of Israel and “toward the boundary of Hauran.” (Eze 47:13, 16) A site by this name is unknown; some consider it a scribal error for “Hazar-enon.”—Eze 47:16, 17; see HAZAR-ENAN, HAZAR-ENON.
